creator: Zoho Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Zoho's Backstage mobile app ensures that attending an event is no longer just an exercise, but an experience to be remembered. Get event information, respond to speakers in real time, customize agenda, and more, all in a single app. 

Impersonal events built around scripted touch points and non-interactive presentations don't allow attendees to get the complete event experience. With the Zoho Backstage app, attendees can interact, customize and give feedback right from their mobile devices.  

Here's why Zoho Backstage is a game changer:

• View the entire event website and be informed of any updates and announcements
• Ask questions to the speaker directly from your mobile device and participate in polls
• Pick and choose sessions that interest you to create your own agenda for the event. Add sessions to your phone’s calendar to stay on top of your day.  
• Snap and upload photos to capture event memories
• Get directions and navigate to the event venue without any hassles. Also avail special discounts on hotels if your Event Organizer has made arrangements
descriptionShort: Get event info, interact with speakers in real time, customize agenda, and more.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Zoho Corporation
4141 Hacienda Drive
Pleasanton, CA 94588, USA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Enhancement for ticket editing and webinar fixes

title: Zoho Backstage for Attendees

container.value:
Estancia IT Park,
Plot no. 140, 151, GST Road,
Vallancheri,
Chengalpattu District - 603 202,
INDIA

creator: Zoho Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Zoho's Backstage mobile app ensures that attending an event is no longer just an exercise, but an experience to be remembered. Get event information, respond to speakers in real time, customize agenda, and more, all in a single app. 

Impersonal events built around scripted touch points and non-interactive presentations don't allow attendees to get the complete event experience. With the Zoho Backstage app, attendees can interact, customize and give feedback right from their mobile devices.  

Here's why Zoho Backstage is a game changer:

• View the entire event website and be informed of any updates and announcements
• Ask questions to the speaker directly from your mobile device and participate in polls
• Pick and choose sessions that interest you to create your own agenda for the event. Add sessions to your phone’s calendar to stay on top of your day.  
• Snap and upload photos to capture event memories
• Get directions and navigate to the event venue without any hassles. Also avail special discounts on hotels if your Event Organizer has made arrangements
descriptionShort: Get event info, interact with speakers in real time, customize agenda, and more.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Estancia IT Park,
Plot no. 140, 151, GST Road,
Vallancheri,
Chengalpattu District - 603 202,
INDIA

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Performance improvements done in OnAir and the Exhibitor section.
2. Find sessions using hall filters which are available in the Sessions tab
3. Within the permitted time, users can remain logged in even when viewing events from different portal.
4. An issue that allowed users to remain logged in to the app beyond the permitted login hours has been resolved.
5. When users sign in using their ticket&name, profile details and order details will not be accessible now.
